revised_title: The Art of Posture-Mastery: A Case Study of Clark, the Posture-Master
tldr: The article describes the incredible physical abilities of Clark, the Posture-Master, who could dislocate his muscles and joints at will, and how he fooled even the famous Mullens. It also mentions that such abilities can be developed from a young age and that there are other individuals who can manipulate their bones and muscles in similar ways.
